If you are a business owner interested in maximizing your marketing dollar, please send us an email at the link below and someone from our team will respond within two business days. We\'d love to have you on-board!

CityApp supports local small businesses and thinks you should too! Help us to improve CityApp by sending to us your comments and suggestions. If you experience a crash or other performance related issue while using our app please let us know by sending us an email (link below). When doing so please include the following information:
A description of what you were doing in the app when you experienced the problem (e.g. \"I was performing a search for all Tex-Mex restaurants with vegetarian options\")
A description of the problem encountered
The manufacturer name and model of the device you are using
The version of the Android OS running on your device

CityApp strives to provide a safe and enjoyable means for consumers to support local small businesses. Vital to this objective is the protection of all users of the application, both consumers and small business owners. In support of this goal CityApp does not collect, store, transmit or otherwise use any Personally Identifiable Information (PII) nor does it make such information available to other entities. CityApp does record businesses marked as "favorites" or "saved" by the user as a means of helping local small businesses maximize their marketing effectiveness. Nevertheless, this data is presented in aggregate form as raw numbers with no means of tracing selections back to the users themselves.
